name: Demon Blade (V. 1.0)
description:
IMPORTANT: There is a font called Monaco in the font's folder. It is recommended to install this font, as the game's text might be messed up otherwise. I will fix the default font issue if possible, soon.

This game is current a work in progress.

You play as an unholy fusion of man and demonic sword.

It is a side-scrolling collectathon with a focus on exploration and characters over combat and precise platforming.

I will be updating the game in the future.

Note: The game can be saved at the beginning pedestal.
